interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Review Date: 2022/03/26
Average Rating: 3.9
Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Nudity', 'violence', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Tim Kirkby'], 'Producers': ['Brad Feinstein', 'Andrew Lazar', 'Steven Shainberg', 'Christina Weiss Lurie'], 'Starring': ['Charlie Hunnam', 'Morena Baccarin', 'Mel Gibson'], 'Studio': ['RLJE Films']}
Review Text: I loved it! First watched it so see Charlie......(and he shaves his beard!!) Charlie's  Sons of Anarchy swag is back......but so much more...cool to see him in a mix of the dramatic role and also lots of fun. The movie was edited well and kept moving at a good pace.... nothing slow. Good screenplay and story. Had lots of fun watching. Just what I needed
Review Title: Really fun movie!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
